security: Releasing the attached photographs could potentially identify individuals and compromise intelligence operations.
summary: Richard Ober (CI/OP) requests that C/NE, C/FE, C/WH, and C/EUR send copies of two photographs to stations that received DIR 92664.
summary_one_paragraph: Richard Ober from CI/OP, via a routing slip dated April 19, 1968, requests that C/NE, C/FE, C/WH, and C/EUR, forward copies of two photographs to the stations that previously received DIR 92664 by direction of the DDP on April 18. The routing slip aims to ensure that each specified station receives the photographs by the most expeditious means possible.
title: Request for Photograph Distribution
